attributes.action: To make it ILLEGAL for businesses to band together to lobby councils or goverment to impose EXTRA TAXES such as a congestion charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 5 june 08. It Has Been Annouced on television today that a group of Propety Developers and associated businesses are calling upon the council in Manchester to impose a Congestion Charge because it would be GOOD FOR THEM!!!! WHAT RIGHT do they have to TAX YOU?. Please Sign Here To Say NO!
